name: My Real Desire
description:
My Real Desire is a mostly VN game mixed with a little bit of a free roam. Right now, the game is in development process.

Overview:

You take a role as MC who just graduated from university. You got a job in a different city, so you have to move into a shared house where everything begins. Meet hot girls, make friends, and explore the story to find out what your real desire is...

Gameplay:

It's very simple. The game is built on choices which will increase your relationship with girls.

Character:

At the moment, there are 9 hot girls in the game. Some of them already have contents while some are still waiting to be made in the future.

Tags:

- Teen, Oral sex, Vagina sex, Hand job, Romance

Support me:

If you enjoy playing my game, please consider supporting me on Patreon. Even your one dollar is very valuable for me. Thank you.
